name: Set Multiple Family Instance Parameters
description:
Set multiple Family Instance parameters in one step by inputting a list of parameter names and a list of corresponding parameter values.

Example:
input 1:  a Family Instance
input 2:  ["Length","Width","Height"]
input 3:  [2.5,5.25,3]
output:  the Family Instance is modified so that it has a length of 2.5, a width of 5.25, and a height of 3.

Notes:
- this version does not check to see if the inputs are valid
- the node uses a recursive loop to set the parameters
- parameters are set in the order of the input lists, so the node will not work if conflicting parameters are set out of order
contents: Set Multiple Family Instance Parameters - Set multiple family instance parameters by inputting a list of parameter names and a corresponding list of parameter values.
